src_original: 1 vīryaṃ / sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate /  kataraṃ cittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā / atītaṃ
2 vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā /  yadi tāvad atītaṃ cittaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ /  yad anāgataṃ cittaṃ tad asaṃprāptaḥ
 98 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa na bahirdhā nobhayayo-m-antarāle
cittaṃ hi kāśyapa arūpy anidarśanam apratigham anābhāsam avijñāptikam apratiṣṭhitam

5 aniketa : cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ na paśyanti na paśyiṣyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na  1 dṛṣtaṃ na paśyanti na drakṣyanti kīdṛśas tasya pracāro draṣṭavyaṃ nānyatra vitathaviparyāsapatitāyā saṃtatyā dharmāḥ pravartante 3
4 bhagnavilīna 6 cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pradīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate / jvalati ca 7
